solution_line_template: For all his activities on the train, Bret spends {reading_hours} + {dinner_hours} + {movies_hours} = <<{reading_hours}+{dinner_hours}+{movies_hours}={total_activity_hours}>>{total_activity_hours} hours.
For his nap, he has {total_ride_hours} - {total_activity_hours} = <<{total_ride_hours}-{total_activity_hours}={nap_hours}>>{nap_hours} hours left.
